content: I updated one of my projects that should only be nicknamed as the token monster.  It had the data for a text Classifier hard coded meaning it got pulled every time the project was loaded. I created a Python script to turn it into JSON files then added the to the Gemini ignore file, removed the hard coded data and load it dynamically. I can use Gemini flash again so yay
